metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3895 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the Region::unflatten function in libs/ui/Region.cpp in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-09-01 and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application, aka internal bug 29983260.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
